Package Design and Printing

Activiry 1 (> Link)

ISGO Technology Trading (HK) Company Limited, self-owned factory and production line located in Shunde, is a comprehensive technology company focusing on the manufacture of machinery and equipment (especially specialized in the special process of curved surface printing), the development, production and sales of environmentally friendly printing consumables, and the provision of overall solutions for curved.
